issue.title: Possible race condition in Event.hh causing Segmentation Fault

content.raw: After some more testing I think this solves the crashing that I and the other poster of the Gazebo Answers question was posting. I have now ran several experiments with Gazebo (running 5 repetitions with a parallel runtime of 6+ hours) with no crashing. This was something I have been unable to do before due to random crashes. I tested the patch on the latest Gazebo 7.8.1 and it works there as well.
content.html: After some more testing I think this solves the crashing that I and the other poster of the Gazebo Answers question was posting. I have now ran several experiments with Gazebo (running 5 repetitions with a parallel runtime of 6+ hours) with no crashing. This was something I have been unable to do before due to random crashes. I tested the patch on the latest Gazebo 7.8.1 and it works there as well.
